title: After 14 days again this issue? Riot when u gonna fix it ??

embed.description: I have connection issues while i trying to login it keeps 2-5 min to login and i can't see champions in champion select. I have some friends with same issues riot fix please.

body: Okay how much we must wait for u to fix this issue? Or just give us some info because i did everything and i can't fix it.

replies.body: Sorry that this is still on-going.  :(  We can do our best to help, but we have no control over ISP's actions.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our tech team will work with you directly to find some options.  We'll see you there!
